page.title: 20HOME LIFE
page.content: My family has four people in it. One is my sister, the other is Mum and the other is my Dad and then me. My house is a bungalow. It has a living room, a bathroom and all the things that a house has. We have two cars; one is an old Triumph and the other a Ford Granada. My Mum and Dad have made a big drive. My sister is l2. She gets some homework and sometimes she cooks at school or does metal work or woodwork. We all go to Derbyshire or somewhere for our holidays in our caravan. My family is not very good at English but my Mum is and my Dad is good at Maths. I have a lot of things to play and do. I have a rope at the bottom of my garden, it is hung on a tree. There are grass-snakes in our garden and I play with them if I can catch them. We get a lot of milk eaten by blue-tits.
